title: Can't change my password and my email
body: So , a lot of people have gained access to my other account so i'd like to change my password and email.But because of yahoo's shenanigans i have lost access to my current email .Is there some way to change my password and email without having access to my email?

replies.body: It's really important to keep your account info to yourself!  Sharing can result in cases like this, and account sharing can warrant account closure.  No worries, though, we might be able to help here.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help update your info and retrieve your account.  See you there!
